Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28493 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-28493 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 20.14.0-1, affected by CVE-2020-28493
